_header: O Lord God O Christ Jesu
Note:
A verse rendering of a prose prayer on f. 146, printed by Bennett (1955)
XBennett, Jack Arthur Walter. Devotional Pieces in Verse and Prose from Ms. Arundel 285 and Ms. Harleian 6919.
Scottish Text Society 3rd ser. 23. Edinburgh: Blackwood, 1955, 240.
Title(s): ‘Ane deuoit orisoun… in the honour of þe sevin wordis that our saluiour spak apoun þe croce’
Subjects: prayers, by Christ and His Passion; crucifixion; Christ, Passion of
_description: ‘Ane deuoit orisoun… in the honour of þe sevin wordis that our saluiour spak apoun þe croce’ — eight 8-line tail-rime stanzas and a concluding 5-line stanza

BLAru285.First Lines: O lord God I Ihesu CristO sueit saluiour I þe saleite…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Euer mair þat I may singAnd þair se thy fair face
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Heir followis ane devoit orisoun Tote said in the honour of þe sevin wordis that our saluiour spak apoun þe croce (f. 163)
